alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Grenada; Leflore (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 14 at 12:35AM CST until December 14 at 1:15AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN CARROLL...SOUTHWESTERN GRENADA AND EAST CENTRAL LEFLORE COUNTIES... At 1235 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Greenwood, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Teoc and Malmaison around 1245 AM CST. Leflore and Avalon around 1250 AM CST. Jefferson around 1255 AM CST. Holcomb around 100 AM CST. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
